name: topnfn

stmt.origin: fnmpti(hs0, ctopn, universe, co(cfv(cts, cv(hs0)), crest, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))

body.origin:
|- wfn(ctopn, universe)
-| wcel(co(cfv(cts, cv(hs0)), crest, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), universe)
-| wceq(ctopn, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cfv(cts, cv(hs0)), crest, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ TopOpen[Fn]𝕌
⊣ ((TopSet ` hs0)[|`t](Base ` hs0))∈ 𝕌
⊣ TopOpen =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((TopSet ` hs0)[|`t](Base ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)
